question: India's GDP growth rate in 2018, as per latest World Bank's Global Economic Prospects (GEP) report is?
explanation: As per the report of World Bank's Global Economic Prospects (GEP) India's GDP growth rate is 7.5% in 2018 and 7.7% in 2019. The World Bank has projected a strong 7.2 per cent growth rate for India this year against 6.8 per cent growth in 2016.
